timeline.bodyText:
Some of these options may confuse the user, for example:

Videos and Music/Videos
Playlists and Music/Playlists

Maybe another prefix should be used? YT Music or even YouTube Music.
timeline.author: mauriciocolli
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -150,6 +150,11 @@
     <string name="tracks">Tracks</string>
     <string name="users">Users</string>
     <string name="events">Events</string>
+    <string name="music_songs">Music/Songs</string>
+    <string name="music_videos">Music/Videos</string>
+    <string name="music_albums">Music/Albums</string>
+    <string name="music_playlists">Music/Playlists</string>
+    <string name="music_artists">Music/Artists</string>

replies.bodyText:
I was already wondering if this would be the best way to label it (for both the users, and the translators).
YouTube Music returning different titles isn't really an issue imho.
replies.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText: I suggest to do something like this. Not sure, how we can implement this, but it is the best things I can up with until we have a proper search filter dialog.
replies.author: TobiGr

timeline.bodyText:
Yeah, adding a disabled item as a header title is bad...
Though I don't know if something like that can even be implemented in a native way (closest thing would be a sub-menu), and I'm not sure if it's worth it to add custom components when this option will be improved in the near future.
Will we just leave it like this until that day?
timeline.author: mauriciocolli

replies.bodyText: No, this couldn't be implemented in a native way other than submenus. I told Tobias that I didn't really like using a disabled item for that, but he seems to be fine with it until we improve the whole search filter thing some day.
replies.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, adding a disabled item as a header title is bad...

Yes. I hope that we will get proper search filter soon.
replies.author: TobiGr

timeline.message: Add support for INFINITE_ and MORE_THAN_100_ITEMS in playlists

Detect ITEM_COUNT_* in localizeStreamCount()

ITEM_COUNT_INFINITE and ITEM_COUNT_MORE_THAN_100.
Use localizeStreamCount in PlaylistFragment and PlaylistItemHolder
Also use localizeStreamCount() in local items

Use "mini" stream count alternatives for info items

Note: more_than_100_videos_mini and infinite_videos_mini are untranslatable
Add ability to translate YouTube Music search options
Use suggested layout for search filters
